minRows.description: The minimum number of rows to display.

maxRows.description: Maximum number of rows up to which the textarea can grow.

cacheMeasurements.description: Reuse previously computed measurements when computing height of textarea.

label.description: The content to display as the label.

value.description: The current value of the textarea (controlled).

defaultValue.description: The default value of the textarea (uncontrolled).

description.description: A description for the textarea. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.

errorMessage.description: An error message for the textarea.

fullWidth.description: Whether the textarea should take up the width of its parent.

isRequired.description: Whether user input is required on the textarea before form submission.

isReadOnly.description: Whether the textarea can be selected but not changed by the user.

validationState.description: Whether the textarea should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.

disableAnimation.description: Whether the textarea should be animated.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the checkbox slots.
